name: get_the_latest_remote_jobs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool remote_jobs_api.
Tool description: Get a list of remote jobs from different resources: weworkremotely, remoteok, GitHub, StackOverflow, Twitch, Mailchimp, Figma...
API description: Fetches the latest 20 remote job listings from a specified company and/or category using the RapidAPI.

company.description: The company name to filter job listings (default is 'shopify').

category.description: The job category to filter job listings (default is None).
